tuv.seg: Overview Document Steps involved in buying a home This document looks at what you need to consider before buying a property and the processes involved
Overview Document Na céimeanna a bhaineann le teach a cheannach Beidh ort ceann de na cinntí is mó i do shaol a dhéanamh nuair a bheidh tú ag ceannach tí
Tax relief on mortgage interest payments is no longer available for new purchasers since 31 December 2012
Ní cheadaítear aon fhaoiseamh cánach ar ús morgáiste le haghaidh morgáistí a glacadh i ndiaidh an 31 Nollaig 2012
Stamp duty on property
Dleacht stampála ar réadmhaoin
Stamp duty is payable on the transfer of property
Tá dleacht stampála iníoctha ar aistriú réadmhaoine
Each time the ownership of a property changes, a new deed of title is drawn up to record the change
Gach uair a athraítear úinéireacht réadmhaoine, déantar gníomhas nua teidil a dhréachtú chun an t-athrú a chur i gcuntas
The Property Registration Authority is responsible for 2 systems for recording property transactions
Tá an tÚdarás Clárúcháin Maoine freagrach as dhá chóras chun idirbhearta réadmhaoine a chur i gcuntas
Property rights of cohabiting couples
Cearta maoine lánúineacha comhchónaithe
Property rights of cohabiting couples relating to buying a home, private rented accommodation, local authority housing, and the Family Home Protection Act
Pléann an cháipéis seo na cearta maoine atá ag lánúineacha comhchónaithe maidir le tithíocht údaráis áitiúla, cóiríocht phríobháideach ar chíos agus an tAcht um Chosaint Tí an Teaghlaigh
This document is in: Family and Relationships > Cohabiting couples
This document is in: Teaghlach agus Caidrimh > Lánúineacha comhchónaithe
Insurance protection on mortgages
Polasaithe árachais chun do mhorgáiste a chosaint
Brief description of 2 different types of insurance that you can take out in respect of a mortgage
Sainiú achomair ar 2 shaghas éagsúla árachais is féidir leat a fháil maidir le morgáiste
Costs of buying a home
Na costais a bhaineann le teach a cheannach
As well as mortgage payments, the other costs involved in buying a home can be significant
Chomh maith le híocaíochtaí morgáiste, tá costais shuntasacha eile ag baint le ceannach tí
Moving to a new home
Ag bogadh go teach nua
A summary of steps to take when moving house, including transferring utilities, redirecting post and notifying schools
Achoimre ar na bearta atá le glacadh nuair a bhogtar teach, fóntais a aistriú, post a atreorú agus scoileanna a chur ar an eolas ina measc
Most Read in "Housing"
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Tithíocht"
Applying for local authority/social housing
Iarratas a dhéanamh ar thithíocht shóisialta/údaráis áitiúil
If your landlord wants you to leave
Má theastaíonn ó do thiarna talún go bhfágfadh tú an teach nó an t-árasan
